synopsis.text: Three teenage girls, Yuuko, Kaori, and Michiyo, each face personal struggles in their romantic lives. Yuuko wishes to impress her crush, Kaori copes with family issues and loneliness, while tomboyish Michiyo questions her appearance after her crush moves away without noticing her. By chance, all three girls receive the same lovely yellow sundress with a rose pattern. At first, having this dress seems like a blessing - a chance to transform themselves and catch the eye of the boy they like. However, they soon realize the dress carries a sinister curse. Any girl who wears it is destined to encounter misfortune and heartbreak. Despite learning of the curse, the allure of the dress and the possibility of gaining their crush's affection may prove too powerful for the girls to resist. As they each take their turn wearing the bewitching garment, they hurtle down paths paved with both temporary joy and lasting sorrow. Will the dress ultimately bring them romance or ruin? This supernatural drama reveals how far young women may go to achieve their romantic dreams, no matter the cost.
